pvp.whyGood: Incredible bulk with Water/Fairy typing. Resists Fighting and Dark while threatening Dragons. One of the most reliable safe swaps in Great League.
pvp.idealIvsExplanation: Low attack keeps CP down, letting you reach higher level for more bulk.
pvp.moveNotes: Hydro Cannon is a Community Day move - requires Elite TM if missing.

raid.whyNot: Attack stat too low to be useful in raids. Pure PvP pick.

pvp.whyGood: Ground/Steel typing gives incredible resistances. Walls Flyers and Steel types while hitting back hard with Rock Slide. Extremely safe switch.
pvp.idealIvsExplanation: Standard PvP spread - minimize attack for more bulk at CP cap.
pvp.moveNotes: Mud Shot generates energy fast. Rock Slide is spammy, Earthquake is closing power.

raid.whyNot: Stats optimized for bulk not damage output.

pvp.whyGood: Fighting/Psychic gives unique coverage. High stat product at level 50-51. Counters Darks and Steels while resisting Fighting.
pvp.idealIvsExplanation: Needs XL candy to reach full potential. Slightly higher attack can hit important breakpoints.
pvp.moveNotes: Ice Punch is cheap bait and hits Flyers. Psychic provides STAB closing power.

raid.whyNot: Better Fighting options exist for raids. XL investment better used for PvP.

pvp.whyGood: Dragon/Flying with amazing bulk in Great League. Dragon Breath chunks and Sky Attack is spammy. Resists common Fighting/Grass/Water types.
pvp.idealIvsExplanation: Standard bulk spread. Can hit level 29 with these IVs.
pvp.moveNotes: Sky Attack is the main move. Moonblast hits Darks and opposing Dragons.

raid.whyNot: Low attack stat. Better Dragon/Flying options for raids.

pvp.whyGood: Water/Ground has only one weakness (Grass). Hydro Cannon is incredibly spammy. Works in all leagues with appropriate IVs.
pvp.idealIvsExplanation: For Great League. Ultra wants closer to 0/15/15. Master wants 15/15/15.
pvp.moveNotes: Hydro Cannon is mandatory Community Day move. Earthquake for Steel coverage, Sludge Wave surprises Fairies.

raid.whyGood: Good Water and Ground attacker. Accessible via Community Day. Hydro Cannon hits hard.
raid.idealIvsExplanation: Raids want max stats for damage output.
raid.moveNotes: Hydro Cannon for Water DPS, Earthquake if using as Ground attacker.

pvp.whyGood: Ghost/Grass is unique typing. Shadow Claw generates energy fast. Seed Bomb spam with Shadow Ball closer. Beats Waters, Grounds, and Fighters.
pvp.idealIvsExplanation: Standard PvP spread for maximum bulk.
pvp.moveNotes: Seed Bomb is cheap bait. Shadow Ball is nuke. Can run Foul Play for Dark coverage.

raid.whyNot: Ghost and Grass have better raid attackers. PvP specialist.

pvp.whyGood: Dark/Ghost has only Fairy weakness. Shadow Claw charges fast. Return (purified) provides neutral coverage. Incredible safe swap.
pvp.idealIvsExplanation: Needs XL candy. Purified version gets Return which is key for coverage.
pvp.moveNotes: Must be purified for Return. Foul Play is STAB. Power Gem can surprise Flyers.

raid.whyNot: Extremely low attack. Pure PvP Pokemon.

pvp.whyGood: Pure Steel typing with legendary bulk. Lock-On charges moves instantly. Zap Cannon hits hard and can debuff. Walls Fairies and Dragons.
pvp.idealIvsExplanation: Needs XL candy for Great League. Ultra can use level 40-41 versions.
pvp.moveNotes: Zap Cannon is primary. Focus Blast hits Steels. Flash Cannon is STAB but rarely used.

raid.whyNot: Lock-On does almost no damage. Pure PvP legendary.

pvp.whyGood: Rock/Steel is incredibly bulky. Double resists Normal and Flying. Smack Down hits hard. Stone Edge provides closing power.
pvp.idealIvsExplanation: Needs significant XL candy investment. Low attack helps reach higher levels.
pvp.moveNotes: Stone Edge is main nuke. Flamethrower can surprise Steel counters.

raid.whyNot: Too slow and bulky for raid DPS. Walls in PvP only.

pvp.whyGood: Steel/Flying resists 10 types. Air Slash and Sky Attack provide consistent damage. Walls Grasses, Fighters, and Fairies.
pvp.idealIvsExplanation: Standard bulk spread. Reaches good stat product without XL.
pvp.moveNotes: Sky Attack is reliable and spammy. Brave Bird is high risk/reward nuke.

raid.whyNot: Low attack stat. Steel and Flying have better raid options.

pvp.whyGood: Pure Dark with incredible bulk. Snarl charges fast. Last Resort provides neutral coverage. Walls Ghosts and Psychics.
pvp.idealIvsExplanation: XL versions dominate. Ultra League Umbreon is extremely tanky.
pvp.moveNotes: Last Resort is Community Day move - critical for coverage. Psychic can surprise Fighters.

raid.whyNot: Bulk-focused stats. Better Dark attackers for raids.

pvp.whyGood: Grass/Poison beats Waters and Fairies. Frenzy Plant is incredibly fast. Sludge Bomb provides Fairy coverage. Shadow version hits harder.
pvp.idealIvsExplanation: Standard spread. Shadow version is glassier but hits breakpoints.
pvp.moveNotes: Frenzy Plant is mandatory Community Day move. Sludge Bomb kills Fairies.

raid.whyGood: Accessible Grass attacker with Frenzy Plant. Shadow version is top tier Grass DPS.
raid.moveNotes: Frenzy Plant required. Shadow Venusaur is elite.

pvp.whyGood: Normal/Flying with surprise Shadow Ball. Wing Attack charges fast. Sky Attack is consistent. Beats Grasses and Ghosts unexpectedly.
pvp.idealIvsExplanation: Bulk spread helps it tank hits.
pvp.moveNotes: Shadow Ball catches Ghosts and Psychics off guard. Sky Attack is main STAB.

raid.whyNot: Low attack. Flying and Normal have better raiders.

pvp.whyGood: Water/Electric is rare typing. Only weak to Grass and Ground. Massive HP stat. Surf and Thunderbolt provide dual STAB coverage.
pvp.idealIvsExplanation: Maximize that enormous HP stat.
pvp.moveNotes: Spark for energy. Surf is cheap, Thunderbolt hits Waters and Flyers.

raid.whyNot: Low attack stat. Better Water and Electric raiders exist.

pvp.whyGood: Fighting/Ghost is incredible offensive typing. Counter is best fast move in game. Shadow Ball and Close Combat hit hard. Resists Normal.
pvp.idealIvsExplanation: Standard bulk spread for maximum survivability.
pvp.moveNotes: Night Slash is cheap bait with boost chance. Close Combat is risky but powerful.

raid.whyGood: Strong Fighting attacker with good bulk. Shadow Ball gives Ghost coverage too.
raid.moveNotes: Close Combat for maximum Fighting DPS.

pvp.whyGood: Rock/Fairy is unique defensive typing. Rock Throw hits hard. Moonblast threatens Dragons and Fighters. Very bulky.
pvp.idealIvsExplanation: Maximize bulk. Needs XL candy.
pvp.moveNotes: Moonblast is main nuke. Power Gem is cheaper Rock STAB.

raid.whyNot: Low attack. Pure PvP Pokemon.

pvp.whyGood: Dark/Flying with incredible bulk. Air Slash charges decently. Foul Play is spammy. Aerial Ace provides coverage. Beats Ghosts and Grasses.
pvp.idealIvsExplanation: XL needed. Maximize bulk for this tank.
pvp.moveNotes: Foul Play is cheap STAB. Aerial Ace covers Fighters. Shadow Ball is option.

raid.whyNot: Tank stats. Better Flying and Dark attackers exist.

pvp.whyGood: Pure Normal with absurd bulk at XL levels. Lick charges fast. Body Slam is spammy. Power Whip surprises Waters and Grounds.
pvp.idealIvsExplanation: Needs heavy XL investment. Bulk is everything.
pvp.moveNotes: Body Slam spam. Power Whip catches Ground and Water counters.

raid.whyNot: Normal type has no super effective matchups. Pure PvP tank.

pvp.whyGood: Water/Ice with legacy Ice Shard. Double legacy moveset is rare and powerful. Icy Wind debuffs opponents. Beats Dragons and Grasses.
pvp.idealIvsExplanation: Standard bulk spread.
pvp.moveNotes: DOUBLE LEGACY - needs both Ice Shard and Icy Wind. Water Pulse is also legacy. Extremely rare.

raid.whyNot: Legacy requirement and low attack make it PvP only.

pvp.whyGood: Ice/Ghost is offensive typing. Powder Snow charges fast. Avalanche hits hard. Shadow Ball nukes. Glass cannon playstyle.
pvp.idealIvsExplanation: Needs all the bulk it can get.
pvp.moveNotes: Avalanche is main damage. Shadow Ball for Ghosts and Psychics.

raid.whyNot: Too glassy. Better Ice and Ghost raid attackers.

pvp.whyGood: Ghost/Dragon legendary with massive bulk. Shadow Claw charges fast. Dragon Claw is spammy. Shadow Sneak provides Ghost coverage.
pvp.idealIvsExplanation: For Ultra League Premier. Master wants 15/15/15.
pvp.moveNotes: Dragon Claw spam. Shadow Sneak is cheap Ghost STAB. Ancient Power for coverage.

raid.whyNot: Altered forme has defensive stats. Origin forme is better for raids.

pvp.whyGood: Pure Psychic legendary tank. Psycho Cut charges extremely fast. Grass Knot and Moonblast provide wide coverage. Walls Fighters.
pvp.idealIvsExplanation: Bulk is key. Fits perfectly at level 23-25 for Ultra.
pvp.moveNotes: Grass Knot catches Waters and Grounds. Moonblast hits Darks. Future Sight is STAB nuke.

raid.whyNot: Defensive legendary. Better Psychic attackers exist.

pvp.whyGood: Fire/Flying with Incinerate. Incinerate hits hard and charges fast despite being slow. Flame Charge boosts attack. Brave Bird nukes.
pvp.idealIvsExplanation: XL needed for Great League. Standard spread.
pvp.moveNotes: Incinerate is mandatory. Flame Charge baits and boosts. Brave Bird is risky closer.

raid.whyNot: Frail for raids. Better Fire and Flying attackers.

pvp.whyGood: Ice/Water with Community Day moves. Powder Snow is fast. Icicle Spear is incredibly spammy. Earthquake provides coverage.
pvp.idealIvsExplanation: Standard bulk spread for both leagues.
pvp.moveNotes: Icicle Spear is Community Day move - mandatory. Earthquake hits Steels and Fires.

raid.whyGood: Accessible Ice attacker. Icicle Spear is efficient. Good bulk for survivability.
raid.moveNotes: Icicle Spear required.

pvp.whyGood: Steel/Fighting legendary with great resistances. Double Kick charges fast. Sacred Sword is cheap. Stone Edge surprises Flyers.
pvp.idealIvsExplanation: Ultra League fits it well. Master wants higher.
pvp.moveNotes: Sacred Sword is cheap Fighting STAB. Stone Edge hits Flyers hard.

raid.whyNot: Low attack for a legendary. Better Fighting and Steel raiders.

pvp.whyGood: Water/Ghost with great bulk. Hex charges fast. Bubble Beam debuffs. Shadow Ball is strong closer. Walls Fighters.
pvp.idealIvsExplanation: Standard bulk spread. Works in both leagues.
pvp.moveNotes: Bubble Beam debuffs attack. Shadow Ball is main damage. Ice Beam hits Grasses.

raid.whyNot: Bulk-focused. Better Water and Ghost attackers.

pvp.whyGood: Dark/Normal has Fighting immunity (Counter). Triple resist Ghost. Night Slash is spammy with boost chance. Cross Chop for Steels.
pvp.idealIvsExplanation: Bulk helps it win extended fights.
pvp.moveNotes: Counter despite no STAB. Night Slash spams. Cross Chop for Steels. Gunk Shot surprises Fairies.

raid.whyNot: Counter has no STAB. Better Dark raiders.

pvp.whyGood: Dark/Fighting resists Dark and Rock. Counter is elite. Power-Up Punch boosts while Foul Play closes. Beats Steels and Darks.
pvp.idealIvsExplanation: Standard spread. Very bulky for a Fighter.
pvp.moveNotes: Power-Up Punch baits and boosts. Foul Play is cheap Dark STAB.

raid.whyNot: Better pure Fighting attackers for raids.

pvp.whyGood: Water/Fighting with Counter. Mud Shot variant also works. Power-Up Punch and Scald provide pressure. Shadow version hits hard.
pvp.idealIvsExplanation: Bulk-focused spread.
pvp.moveNotes: Scald can debuff. Ice Punch hits Grasses and Dragons. Counter or Mud Shot both viable.

raid.whyNot: Better Fighting and Water options exist.

pvp.whyGood: Fire/Flying with multiple viable movesets. Dragon Breath variant beats Dragons. Wing Attack is faster. Blast Burn is nuke.
pvp.idealIvsExplanation: Bulk helps. Different IVs for different leagues.
pvp.moveNotes: Blast Burn is Community Day move. Dragon Claw is cheap. Fire Spin for Fire damage.

raid.whyGood: Mega Charizard Y is top Fire attacker. Regular Charizard with Blast Burn is solid Fire DPS.
raid.moveNotes: Blast Burn required for raids. Mega Y is elite.

pvp.whyGood: Poison/Dark has only Ground weakness. Snarl charges fast. Dark Pulse and Sludge Wave hit hard. Walls Psychics and Ghosts.
pvp.idealIvsExplanation: Bulky already but more helps.
pvp.moveNotes: Acid Spray debuffs heavily. Dark Pulse is consistent. Sludge Wave for Fairies.

raid.whyNot: Low attack stat. Better Poison and Dark raiders.

pvp.whyGood: Fighting type with wide coverage moves. Shadow version hits extremely hard but is fragile. Counter and Cross Chop are fast.
pvp.idealIvsExplanation: For Ultra League. Master League wants 15/15/15.
pvp.moveNotes: Cross Chop is good for bait. Rock Slide covers Flying weakness.

raid.whyGood: One of the best and most accessible Fighting attackers. Useful against many raid bosses. Shadow Machamp is elite.
raid.idealIvsExplanation: Raids want max attack for DPS.
raid.moveNotes: Dynamic Punch is best Fighting charge move.

pvp.whyGood: Fighting/Steel with Counter. Power-Up Punch builds pressure. Shadow Ball surprises. Glass cannon that hits hard.
pvp.idealIvsExplanation: Needs bulk desperately.
pvp.moveNotes: Power-Up Punch boosts. Shadow Ball hits Ghosts. Aura Sphere is strong but expensive.

raid.whyGood: Top Fighting attacker with Aura Sphere. Steel typing gives useful resistances. Mega Lucario is elite.
raid.moveNotes: Aura Sphere is premium Fighting move.

raid.whyGood: Highest non-shadow, non-mega Fighting DPS. Dynamic Punch hits hard. Bulkier than Machamp.
raid.moveNotes: Simple but effective. Counter + Dynamic Punch.

pvp.whyGood: Rock/Fighting legendary. Double Kick is fast. Sacred Sword is cheap. Rock Slide for Flying coverage.
pvp.idealIvsExplanation: Master League wants max stats.
pvp.moveNotes: Sacred Sword is cheap. Rock Slide covers Flyers.

raid.whyGood: Top Fighting DPS as legendary. Sacred Sword is efficient. Useful in many raids.
raid.moveNotes: Sacred Sword is signature move.

pvp.whyGood: Ground/Rock with huge attack. Mud Slap hits hard. Rock Wrecker is nuke. Beats Fire and Electric types.
pvp.idealIvsExplanation: Master League only. Max stats.
pvp.moveNotes: Rock Wrecker is Community Day move. Surf surprises Ground counters.

raid.whyGood: Top Rock and Ground attacker. Rock Wrecker is best Rock move in game. Very bulky for raids.
raid.moveNotes: Rock Wrecker is mandatory. Smack Down for Rock, Mud Slap for Ground.

raid.whyGood: Highest Rock DPS in game. Glass cannon - dies fast but deals massive damage. Great for short-manning raids.
raid.moveNotes: Pure glass cannon. Smack Down + Rock Slide for speed.

pvp.whyGood: Rock/Dark pseudo-legendary. Smack Down variant for Rock, Bite for Dark. Crunch and Stone Edge hit hard.
pvp.idealIvsExplanation: Master League wants max stats.
pvp.moveNotes: Smack Down is Community Day move for Rock. Bite for Dark attacker.

raid.whyGood: Versatile Rock and Dark attacker. Smack Down for Rock DPS, Bite for Dark. Very bulky for survival.
raid.idealIvsExplanation: Max stats. Shadow version is elite.
raid.moveNotes: Smack Down is Community Day move. Bite + Crunch for Dark.

pvp.whyGood: Dragon/Ground pseudo-legendary. Mud Shot charges fast. Sand Tomb debuffs. Earth Power and Outrage hit hard.
pvp.idealIvsExplanation: For Ultra Premier. Master wants 15/15/15.
pvp.moveNotes: Sand Tomb debuffs. Earth Power is Community Day move. Outrage for Dragon damage.

raid.whyGood: Top Ground and Dragon attacker. Mega Garchomp is elite. Earth Power is efficient. Very high attack stat.
raid.moveNotes: Earth Power is Community Day move. Dragon Tail + Outrage for Dragon.

pvp.whyGood: Ground/Steel with unique resistances. Mud Shot is fast. Drill Run is efficient. Rock Slide covers Flyers.
pvp.idealIvsExplanation: Standard spread for leagues.
pvp.moveNotes: Drill Run is efficient Ground STAB. Rock Slide for coverage.

raid.whyGood: Top Ground attacker. Drill Run is very efficient. Steel typing helps survivability.
raid.moveNotes: Mud Slap for damage. Drill Run for efficient charge move.

pvp.whyGood: Pure Ground legendary with massive stats. Mud Shot charges fast. Fire Punch baits. Earthquake nukes. Primal form dominates.
pvp.idealIvsExplanation: Master League legendary. Max everything.
pvp.moveNotes: Fire Punch baits shields and hits Steels. Earthquake is nuke. Precipice Blades is signature.

raid.whyGood: Top Ground attacker. Primal Groudon with Precipice Blades is best Ground in game. Even regular is excellent.
raid.moveNotes: Precipice Blades is signature move. Earthquake if no PB.

pvp.whyGood: Fire/Dragon legendary. Dragon Breath is fast. Fusion Flare is signature. Crunch surprises Psychics and Ghosts.
pvp.idealIvsExplanation: Master League legendary. Max stats.
pvp.moveNotes: Fusion Flare is signature Fire move. Crunch is cheap. Draco Meteor nukes.

raid.whyGood: Top Fire attacker. Fusion Flare is best Fire move. Dragon typing gives extra utility. Very high attack.
raid.moveNotes: Fusion Flare is signature and best Fire charge move.

raid.whyGood: Top Fire and Ghost attacker. Dual typing gives versatility. Very high attack stat. Glass cannon.
raid.moveNotes: Fire Spin + Overheat for Fire. Hex + Shadow Ball for Ghost.

pvp.whyGood: Fire/Flying legendary. Wing Attack is fast. Sky Attack is efficient. Fire coverage with Overheat.
pvp.idealIvsExplanation: Master League. Max stats.
pvp.moveNotes: Sky Attack is legacy but efficient. Overheat for Fire nuke.

raid.whyGood: Strong Fire and Flying attacker. Sky Attack is very efficient. Good bulk for a Fire type.
raid.moveNotes: Sky Attack is legacy. Overheat for Fire DPS.

pvp.whyGood: Ice/Ground with high attack. Powder Snow charges fast. Avalanche hits hard. High Energy Cost but good nuke.
pvp.idealIvsExplanation: Master League. Max stats for damage.
pvp.moveNotes: Avalanche is main damage. Ground moves for coverage.

raid.whyGood: Top Ice and Ground attacker. Avalanche is efficient. Accessible via Community Day. Shadow version is elite.
raid.moveNotes: Powder Snow + Avalanche for Ice. Mud Slap + Bulldoze for Ground.

raid.whyGood: Highest Ice DPS in game. Extreme glass cannon. Ice Fang and Avalanche hit incredibly hard.
raid.idealIvsExplanation: Max attack. Will faint fast anyway.
raid.moveNotes: Pure glass cannon Ice attacker. Highest non-shadow Ice DPS.

pvp.whyGood: Electric/Dragon legendary. Dragon Breath is fast. Wild Charge hits hard. Crunch provides coverage. Top Master League pick.
pvp.idealIvsExplanation: Master League legendary. Max everything.
pvp.moveNotes: Wild Charge is signature. Crunch is cheap. Outrage for Dragon damage.

raid.whyGood: Top Electric attacker. Fusion Bolt is signature. Dragon typing adds utility. Massive attack stat.
raid.moveNotes: Fusion Bolt is signature Electric move.

raid.whyGood: Accessible Electric attacker. Wild Charge hits hard. Good for players without legendaries.
raid.moveNotes: Thunder Shock + Wild Charge. Ice Punch for coverage.

pvp.whyGood: Ghost/Poison glass cannon. Shadow Claw is fast. Shadow Ball and Sludge Bomb hit hard. Wins fast or loses fast.
pvp.idealIvsExplanation: Needs all the bulk it can get.
pvp.moveNotes: Shadow Claw is legacy but best. Shadow Punch for bait.

raid.whyGood: Top Ghost attacker. Mega Gengar is best Ghost in game. Very high attack. Shadow Claw is legacy.
raid.moveNotes: Shadow Claw is legacy - Elite TM. Lick is alternative. Mega Gengar is elite.

pvp.whyGood: Mythical Dark type. Snarl charges fast. Dark Pulse is consistent. Focus Blast hits Darks and Normals.
pvp.idealIvsExplanation: Master League. Max stats.
pvp.moveNotes: Dark Pulse is main STAB. Focus Blast surprises counters.

raid.whyGood: Top Dark attacker. Very high attack stat. Dark Pulse is efficient. Essential for Psychic and Ghost raids.
raid.moveNotes: Snarl + Dark Pulse for Dark DPS. Shadow Ball for Ghost coverage.

pvp.whyGood: Dark/Dragon pseudo-legendary. Bite is fast. Brutal Swing is spammy. Dragon Pulse and Flash Cannon provide coverage.
pvp.idealIvsExplanation: Master League. Max stats.
pvp.moveNotes: Brutal Swing is Community Day move and key. Dragon Pulse for STAB.

raid.whyGood: Top Dark attacker with Brutal Swing. Also good Dragon attacker. Very high stats.
raid.moveNotes: Brutal Swing is Community Day move - mandatory for Dark DPS.

pvp.whyGood: Dragon/Flying legendary. Dragon Tail is hard hitting. Outrage nukes. Breaking Swipe debuffs. Hurricane for Flying.
pvp.idealIvsExplanation: Master League legendary. Max everything.
pvp.moveNotes: Breaking Swipe debuffs and is cheap. Outrage is nuke. Hurricane for Flying.

raid.whyGood: Top Dragon and Flying attacker. Mega Rayquaza is best Dragon in game. Dragon Ascent is signature Flying move.
raid.moveNotes: Dragon Ascent is signature Flying move. Outrage for Dragon.

pvp.whyGood: Dragon/Flying pseudo-legendary. Dragon Tail is strong. Outrage is nuke. Fire Blast and Draco Meteor provide closing power.
pvp.idealIvsExplanation: Master League. Max stats.
pvp.moveNotes: Outrage is Community Day move. Draco Meteor is expensive nuke.

raid.whyGood: Top Dragon attacker. Mega Salamence is elite. Outrage from Community Day is efficient. High attack stat.
raid.moveNotes: Outrage is Community Day move - mandatory.

pvp.whyGood: Legendary Psychic with highest attack. Psycho Cut charges extremely fast. Psystrike is signature. Shadow Ball and Focus Blast coverage.
pvp.idealIvsExplanation: Master League. Max everything for this beast.
pvp.moveNotes: Psystrike is signature and mandatory. Shadow Ball hits Ghosts. Focus Blast hits Darks.

raid.whyGood: Best Psychic attacker in game. Psystrike is most efficient Psychic move. Shadow Ball makes it top Ghost too. Incredibly versatile.
raid.idealIvsExplanation: Max attack. Shadow Mewtwo is game-breaking.
raid.moveNotes: Psystrike for Psychic DPS. Shadow Ball for Ghost. Ice Beam for versatility.
